title: Her Two Daddies
description: Megan's eighteenth birthday ends up being a much bigger deal than she ever thought after too much champagne leads to overhearing the men who raised her – her stepfather and his brother – talking about her sexy, voluptuous body. She hatches a plan to get them both in bed with her for a night of celebration none of them will ever forget. Contains explicit sexual scenes of erotic fiction hot enough to burn.
author: Jasmine Dayne
